short_summary: COVID-19 voluntary rapid antigen testing on-site
description: The project is to provide employees returning to the physical workplace with a voluntary antigen rapid test. This aims to help limit the spread of the virus and increase the safety of the workplace. Ensure service will include, but not be limited to: • active participation in daily assignment of colleagues and all practitioner personnel for the antigen tests; • insure antigen test kits exist within testing panels; • ready the required information and conducting the antigen test.
